definition: serving an aesthetic purpose in beautifying the body, a toiletry designed to beautify the body
details:
adjective
- serving an aesthetic purpose in beautifying the body
= example: serving an aesthetic purpose in beautifying the body
= synonyms: enhancive
- serving an esthetic rather than a useful purpose
= example: serving an esthetic rather than a useful purpose
= synonyms: decorative
noun
- a toiletry designed to beautify the body
